page.title: 11SANDOWN-3
page.content: He had to be in attendance at the airport on the day in case the helicopter crashed. The planes they use for pleasure flights are called Cessnas. They are also the most common plane at the airport. The safety record at the airport is nothing but the best. They have a fire truck and have 3 firemen, but when there is a fire only 2 of them are needed. A new control tower is being built in place of the little room they used before. The radios they use to contact the planes cost Â£1000 each (they have 2). The airports radio frequency is 123.50. Pilots tune into this when they want to know what kind of weather it is at Sandown and whether they can land there. They have 2 weather charts aday one for the morning and one for the afternoon.
